file_content.text: It... it worked! Listen, Lord Vivicar... he's out in deep space, on some sort of vessel... here, take the coordinates.
He's surrounded himself with defenses. Send this. It's his code. It will give you... time to get aboard.
No--the darkness... Vivicar's will is too strong. I can't hold on! Please, kill me! End it now!
There's a better way, Master.
No. I won't. [Shield her]
I won't let that darkness touch you.
You're safe now. [Shield her]
Ahhh. The darkness... it's gone. But--you look exhausted. You have sacrificed so much for me.
Hopefully Vivicar should no longer be able to influence you.
Is Vivicar gone too?
Your shielding ability has driven him from my mind. Thank you.
I owe it to my Master.
You took a stupid risk.
I--I must rest. Please, go to Master Syo and the Council. They should hear of what we've learned.
I am obedient, Master Yuon.
As you wish. [Kill her]
May the Force protect you.
Yes. Yuon knew greatest lesson of hunt. When beyond saving, it is better to go to Scorekeeper.
Will you be alright?
I'm sorry, Qyzen.
Yuon was a good Master, and a great Jedi.
I'll miss her.
No sorrow. Yuon had many points. Is Scorekeeper's now.
Don't you care about anybody?
That's a cold attitude.
Hunters live, fight and die. Is way of things.
But hunt goes on, Herald. Your enemy is close.
Thank you for coming. I have made all the preparations for the ritual to find Lord Vivicar.
I plan to create a connection between us, using your shielding ability. If it is, was, Parkanas, this should work.
Drawing on your strength, I will invert the link between myself and Vivicar, and use it to sense his location.
Don't expose yourself to Lord Vivicar's influence longer than necessary.
We need to work fast.
I won't. For your sake, as well as mine.
This ritual sounds dangerous for both of us.
Isn't that risky?
I don't like the idea of being used as a crutch.
You'll be siphoning my power?
There are risks. For one, the shielding you gave me on Coruscant will be severed.
I don't know what will happen then. It's possible I could die once your shield is gone.
You must resist, Master Yuon. Don't give Vivicar another victory.
I hope not.
With your strength to sustain me, we will do what we can.
Very well, Master.
If that happens, we'll never find Vivicar.
I need you alive.
Then let's hope I survive, Jedi.
No matter what happens, you must give me as much time as possible. Reversing the link may be a long process. Let us begin.
Yes, yes--it's working. I can feel his mind and... uhhh... I can feel--I--
She can feel the power that she's challenging. There is no hope.
Jedi. You don't look as strong as you did last time we spoke.
Yuon has drained your strength and made herself vulnerable to me. Still arrogant and reckless.
You were once Parkanas Tark, a brave Jedi. You could be that man again.
I know your real name.
The past means nothing. All that matters is the future, which doesn't involve you.
I can take anything you throw at me, Vivicar.
I'm not afraid.
Perhaps a little test is in order.
You're dead, Vivicar.
No, Jedi. Your interference ends here and now.
See how Yuon's will crumbles before mine. Fitting, that two of my enemies will destroy each other.
